attributes.action: Introduce the Remembrance Sunday (Closure of Shops) Bill.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the 10th March 2010, Sir Patrick Cormack introduced a bill named the Remembrance Sunday (Closure of Shops) Bill, in the House of Commons. We would like the Government to support this bill and introduce it as soon as possible.
